channel.title: Jarring a client please help. Rep++
channel.description: Okay, very small problem and I don't know why it keeps happening... My jar doesnt give me this error but it gives it to everyone else. It says "Cannot find main client.class". I believe its a problem with me signing the Jar and if anyone can help that would be great! Thanks. If you can do over teamview just PM me. Thanks!

item.title: Jarring a client please help. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Okay, very small problem and I don’t know why it keeps happening… My jar doesnt give me this error but it gives it to everyone else. It says “Cannot find main client.class”. I believe its a problem with me signing the Jar and if anyone can help that would be great! Thanks. If you can do over teamview just PM me. Thanks!
